text: Samresh Singh is an Indian politician from the state of Jharkhand and He was the Vice President of Jharkhand Vikas Morcha (P). He was a member of the Jharkhand Legislative Assembly representing the Bokaro constituency. He was the first Science and Technology Minister of Jharkhand State Government. ==References== Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Jharkhand Vikas Morcha (Prajatantrik) politicians Category:Members of the Jharkhand Legislative Assembly Category:State cabinet ministers of Jharkhand
title: Samresh Singh
